name: part_010
file: tmp_【3D LIVE】ねぽらぼ学園 ☆5周年記念！！輝く学寮祭☆【#ねぽらぼ5周年学祭3Dライブ】 [-7fWewjcygo]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_010.mov

scenes.description: NePoLaBo (Nene, Polka, Lamy, Botan) performs a medley of 'Cosmic Wonderful Tour!' and 'Twinkle 4 You' on the school festival stage.
MC section in the dormitory room where the members celebrate the success of the festival but realize they forgot to perform their new song.

subtitles.original: Cosmic Wonderful Tour!
subtitles.english: Cosmic Wonderful Tour!

subtitles.original: 一歩目が すでに異空間
subtitles.english: Our first step is already in a different dimension

subtitles.original: キラリ 渦に巻き込まれた？
subtitles.english: Sparkling, were you sucked into the vortex?

subtitles.original: 違うよ 出会いたくって
subtitles.english: No, it's because I wanted to meet you

subtitles.original: ホラ みんなここにいる
subtitles.english: See? Everyone is right here

subtitles.original: 夢のようで だけどね
subtitles.english: It feels like a dream, yet

subtitles.original: ファンタジーじゃない感
subtitles.english: it's not quite a fantasy

subtitles.original: 流星群 負けないよう
subtitles.english: Outshining the meteor shower,

subtitles.original: 光放って！
subtitles.english: let the light burst forth!

subtitles.original: どんな憧れも飛び越えて
subtitles.english: Surpassing any yearning

subtitles.original: 銀河のまん中 行進しよう
subtitles.english: Let's march into the center of the galaxy

subtitles.original: きらめきのシンフォニーさ
subtitles.english: It's a symphony of sparkles

subtitles.original: 足跡だって 星になる
subtitles.english: Even our footprints will become stars

subtitles.original: 1, 2, 3... Yeah! 奇跡 散りばめよう
subtitles.english: 1, 2, 3... Yeah! Let's scatter miracles

subtitles.original: 1, 2, 3... Yeah! 何万光年を
subtitles.english: 1, 2, 3... Yeah! Over tens of thousands of light-years

subtitles.original: 1, 2, 3... Yeah! 旅してゆく 季節が今
subtitles.english: 1, 2, 3... Yeah! The season of our journey

subtitles.original: 始まったんだよきっと！
subtitles.english: has surely begun right now!

subtitles.original: せーの！
subtitles.english: One, two!

subtitles.original: Wonderful Tour!
subtitles.english: Wonderful Tour!

subtitles.original: Wonderful Tour!
subtitles.english: Wonderful Tour!

subtitles.original: 君に届け 星のメロディー
subtitles.english: May the starry melody reach you

subtitles.original: 想いをギュッギュッと詰め込んで
subtitles.english: Packed tight with all our feelings

subtitles.original: 君と奏でる このハーモニー
subtitles.english: This harmony I'm playing with you

subtitles.original: これからも ずっと続いていく
subtitles.english: will continue on forever

subtitles.original: Twinkle 4 You
subtitles.english: Twinkle 4 You

subtitles.original: ねえねえ もっと近くにおいでよ
subtitles.english: Hey, hey, come a little closer

subtitles.original: 回り始めた世界で 踊らない？ 終わらない
subtitles.english: In this world that's started turning, won't you dance? It'll never end

subtitles.original: わくわく 魔法かけたら
subtitles.english: When the excitement casts a spell

subtitles.english: Our heartbeats sync up, look, it's Party Time and it won't stop

subtitles.english: May the starry melody resonate with you

subtitles.english: Drawing a new constellation

subtitles.english: In this sky that connects us

subtitles.english: Let's scatter jewels

subtitles.english: May the starry melody reach you

subtitles.english: This harmony I'm playing with you

subtitles.original: La La La...
subtitles.english: La La La...

subtitles.original: La La La...
subtitles.english: La La La...

subtitles.original: やっぱ ねぽらぼ だな〜！！
subtitles.english: It's NePoLaBo after all!!

subtitles.original: これで学寮祭は、大成功〜！
subtitles.english: With this, the Dormitory Festival is a huge success!!
Ah...

subtitles.original: えっ、ししろん？ どうしたの？
subtitles.english: Eh, Shishiron? What's wrong?

subtitles.original: いやさ…… 確かに良かったんだけど…… なんかこう…… 「何か」を忘れてる気がするんだよね
subtitles.english: No, it's just that, it was definitely great, but... somehow... I feel like we're forgetting something.

subtitles.original: なぁに言ってんの！？ このメドレーで完璧だってば！
subtitles.english: What are you talking about?! This medley made it perfect!

subtitles.original: そうだよ〜！ これでみんな、ひとつになってハッピー！
subtitles.english: Exactly! Everyone's united now and happy!!

subtitles.original: 来てくれた人たちも、きっと、ラミィたちの声を聞いて、喜んでくれたよ！
subtitles.english: The people who came must have been happy hearing our voices too!

subtitles.original: ひとつ…… 声…… あっ！！
subtitles.english: United... voices... Ah!!!

subtitles.original: 私たち、新曲作ってたじゃん！！
subtitles.english: We made a new song, didn't we!!

subtitles.original: あっ……
subtitles.english: Ah...

subtitles.original: わすれてたぁーーーーー！！！
subtitles.english: I totally forgot!!!

subtitles.original: ねねたち、あんなに練習したのにっ！！
subtitles.english: And we practiced so hard for it!!
